name: Forever Ahoying
description:
Ahoy mateys, arrr you ready for adventure? Well hop aboard and man the wheel. It's fine, the boat's insured. Lets get out there and grab some booty!

This is a simple endless runner game made in a week during UCSC's 120 course in the game design program. Use the wheel in the middle of the screen to control your boat and avoid the rocks/enemy pirate ships.

Credits:

Juan Alvarado - UI Programming, Music/SFX design

Riley Dix - Production, Design

Maxwell Mollison - Art, Programming

Keenan Rea - Gameplay Programming
